#x ranges are kept, whereas z ranges are ignored (i.e, in this example, and x between 170000 and 190000 is kept, but a z equal to 0 will be removed) 
x 158000 176000 158000 176000 157000 175000 158000 176000 157000 175000
x 268000 286000 268000 286000 267000 285000 268000 286000 267000 285000
x 378000 396000 378000 396000 377000 395000 378000 396000 377000 395000
x 488000 506000 488000 506000 487000 505000 488000 506000 487000 505000
x 598000 616000 598000 616000 597000 615000 598000 616000 597000 615000
z 0 0
#z 4000 inf
